pages.text:
Kings Gate is a full-service event center offering everything necessary to plan and execute a flawless special event that fits your style, personality and budget.
Our location in Port Charlotte, Florida is easily accessible off of Interstate 75. We specialize in wedding ceremonies and receptions, corporate holiday parties, class reunions, anniversary celebrations and any other reason you have to celebrate!
Our Grand Ballroom allows for over 300 guests with a built-in dance floor and oversized chandeliers for added ambiance but can easily be divided to accommodate smaller events, all while overlooking our beautiful pool area and Golf Course. If you are looking to host a business meeting, our Palace Theatre is the perfect private and quiet location and can accommodate up to 80 guests theatre style.
Our banquet facility offers a beautiful grand lobby plus ample parking. Privacy is also provided as golfers have other designated areas for food and beverage and walkways to and from the Golf Course.
Grand Ballroom – $1,800
Capacity: Approximately 200-300 Guests
Crown Room – $1,000
Capacity: Approximately 80-200 Guests
Imperial Room – $600
Capacity: Approximately 40-100 Guests
Palace Theatre – $400
Capacity: Approximately 40-80 Guests
Lion's Den – $500
Capacity: 120 (available Saturday evenings & Mondays)
Prices may vary based on time of the year.
Included Amenities
All tables and chairs with set up and take down in your choice of layout
Table linens and napkins in limited choice of color
White china, glassware and flatware
Assigned Day-of Service Captain
Professional serving Team
Ample parking
High speed WiFi
Additional Services and Rental Items may be purchased
Catering
Unforgettable catering is provided on-site by our acclaimed chef team. Items are prepared fresh with quality ingredients and custom displayed for your event. Hors d’ oeuvres may also be offered on buffet stations or butler passed by our serving Team.
Consultations are available if you would like to customize a menu tailored to your event. You may specify exactly what you are looking for or provide a general theme and budget and let our catering professionals provide recommendations for the event.
All food and beverage must be purchased through the Kings Gate catering department, with the exception of wedding cakes and guests favors. Florida State sales tax and a 20% service charge are applied to all catering selections. Wedding cakes are an exception and may be facilitated by an outside vendor.
Bar Service
Bar service is optional and available for an additional set up fee for events. Kings Gate has a full liquor license with beer, wine and spirits available. You may opt to let guests pay for all of their own drinks, host the entire bar or anything in between. Hosted bars are available by category (such as beer and wine only), time period or set dollar amount.
Soda, coffee, iced tea and sparkling cider may be hosted with or without bar service. If no alcohol is provided, these beverages may be available on a self-serve table with only a minimum requirement per item and no bar set up fee
Bar pricing is competitive and a price list is available. Additional wine list is available upon request.
All beverages must be purchased through Kings Gate with Florida State sales and liquor tax and a 20% service charge applied. Kings Gate reserves the right to confiscate any outside alcohol and dismiss any guests who violate liquor policy. Identification is required for anyone consuming alcoholic beverages.
Contact us today to book your tour!
To request more information please fill out the contact form below
SharpSpring Form for Special Event - Club Website

Member Privileges
Unlimited Golf
No Walking Fee
14 Days in Advance Tee Times
Reciprocal Privileges at other Hampton Golf Managed Properties
Member Only Events (Golf and Social)
Preferred Dining Reservations
Access to All Member Social Functions
Reduced Golf Fees
